abstract: The report by the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences is the latest indication that China may be investing too aggressively in property and infrastructure projects.
snippet: The report by the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences is the latest indication that China may be investing too aggressively in property and infrastructure projects.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — China’s local government debt has reached an “alarming level” and poses a significant risk to the country’s fast-growing economy, according to a Chinese government think tank.

headline.main: Report Faults Increase in China’s Local Government Debt
